divs: Sighting DetailsIt all started about 9:04am I saw a star that looked like it was moving... I dismissed it as an optical illusion till I noticed it was actually going across the sky immediately after my initial notice my girlfriend points to the right of where I was looking and there was another object closer and brighter going across the sky. Then soon after that there was a streak of white light parallel to the ground which I thought was a shooting star my girl friend disagreed. Utterly intrigued I remained outside head pinned upwards. I live very close to Travis Air Force Base and almost instantly a get was scrambled and was circling around the circumference of the base round and round. I saw 10 object in total over this hour long period the majority of them looked as though they were heading away from where I was observing past the base. Some of the objects would just move for a bit in then seem to swirl out into nothing, just disappear. There were other planes out during the night and I can assure you these were no planes. As all this was going on I kept trying to call all of my friends to see if they had seen anything I did find one that saw the one in the first set I saw. It was a very interesting night to say the least.
Summary: Bright stars moving about the sky
trends: there have been no other sightings in fairfield\tafb
This sighting has never been favorited.
